title: Best Shadow Pokemon to TM for PvP

description: Whether you meet new friends or that one person who doesn't open your gifts, here's a list of PvP trade ideas with low friendship level!

description: See which Latias and Latios raid counters also double as top Master League picks!

title: Developing an AI for Pokemon GO Trainer Battles
